title: Installation Overview PCC - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
text: The Policy Charging and Control solution depends on a set of components. The order in which these are installed is defined here: Installing MediationZone to provide the majority of the functions in [CZ] and [EZ], see Installation of Control Zone and Execution Zone for PCC . Installing the Data Repository. [DR] for storage and [CZ] for management, see Installation of the Data Repository for PCC .
